statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT interaction_id, message_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions;
SELECT customer_id, message_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_id, sentiment_score, sent_at FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY sent_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sent_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT interaction_id, message_text, sent_at FROM social_media_interactions WHERE sentiment_score < 0.3 ORDER BY sentiment_score ASC, sent_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_interactions WHERE customer_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001') AND sentiment_score > 0.7
SELECT message_text, sentiment_score FROM social_media_interactions ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, sent_at ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_datetime, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, social_media_handle FROM customers WHERE social_media_handle = 'example_social_media'
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_content FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_datetime FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customers LEFT JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive';
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM MessageTailoring WHERE targeted_group = 'VIP Customers';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_content, sentiment_analysis FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE sentiment_analysis = 'positive'
SELECT message_content FROM MessageTailoring WHERE targeted_group = 'new_customers'
SELECT interaction_id, customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2022-08-01'
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM posts WHERE post_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT post_id, reactor_name, reaction_type FROM reactions WHERE reaction_type = 'LIKE' ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Twitter';
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments JOIN posts ON comments.post_id = posts.post_id WHERE commenter_name LIKE 'John%' AND post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT posts.post_id, posts.post_content, reactions.reactor_name, reactions.reaction_type FROM posts INNER JOIN reactions ON posts.post_id = reactions.post_id WHERE reactions.reaction_type = 'Like';

SELECT social_media_accounts.account_id, social_media_accounts.account_name, posts.post_content, comments.commenter_name FROM social_media_accounts LEFT JOIN posts ON social_media_accounts.account_id = posts.account_id LEFT JOIN comments ON posts.post_id = comments.post_id WHERE comments.commenter_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers
SELECT customer_name, age FROM Customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM Posts WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 2
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.post_content FROM Customers c JOIN Posts p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM Customers c JOIN Posts p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_name;
SELECT c.customer_name, m.message_content FROM Customers c JOIN Messages m ON c.customer_id = m.sender_id WHERE m.message_date > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY m.message_date DESC;
